sentences.sContent: The housing market continues to languish.
The shares are languishing at just 46p after yesterday’s fall.
sentences.sCn: 股价经历了昨天的下跌后，就停滞在46便士上了。

sentences.sContent: West Ham United are currently languishing at the bottom of the league.
sentences.sCn: 西汉姆联队目前在联赛中一直排名垫底。

synos.tran: 憔悴；凋萎；失去活力；苦思

words.tran: 渴望的；含情脉脉的；渐渐衰弱的

trans.tranOther: ifsomething languishes, it fails to improve and develop or become successful
